mapper.select: select tnum, category, title, contents, DATE_FORMAT(createdate, "%Y-%m-%d") as createdate, ownerid, ownername, view_cnt from tips where category='column' order by createdate desc limit #{start}, #{count}

mapper.insert: insert into tips(category, title, contents, ownerid, ownername) values(#{category}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{ownerid}, #{ownername})
mapper.update: update tips set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, view_cnt=view_cnt+1 where tnum=#{tnum}
